content.title: Chainalysis releases the 2024 Geography of Crypto Report - ForumPay
content.description: As part of this report, Chainalysis creates a Global Crypto Adoption Index, which ranks the 151 countries on which they have sufficient data in order to see which country and region is leading the charge on crypto adoption, and why.
content.content: 143  Share  CryptoWorld  What is Ethereum?  Ethereum is both a decentralized software platform and a cryptocurrency, the latter being more correctly known as ether (ETH). Ethereum is currently the second      .st0{fill:#041627;}  Read more
